location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Skipp, in Schyrass [Shiraz], to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the author's conversations with Shaik Nassir [Sheikh Nāsir] about the rent for the Company factory at Bushire. Also contained is a request for information regarding the expedition against Carrack [Kharg] as Karim Khan's forces at Genover [Bandar e-Ganāveh] and Bunderick [Bandar Rig] are waiting orders to assist.
